languages.english-overview:
ClipBucket is an opensource and free script that will let you start your own Video Sharing(Youtube Clone) website in matter of minutes, ClipBucket is fastest growing script with most video sharing websites and social networking freatures.
ClipBucket is a free and opensource video sharing script. The owners have permitted us to redistribute ClipBucket.
NOTE: FFMPEG and certain Video Tools need to be installed for this script to work.

ul.li: New Web 2.0 Layout Design for both User and Admin
Easy to Moderate Videos, Users , Groups etc.
Create Different User Groups to assign different permissions
Extendible with Plugins and Addons like WordPress
Easy to install Themes and templates
